mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (id, title, content, writer) VALUES (#{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, writer = #{writer}, content = #{content}, number = #{number} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, writer, content, number date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as reg_date FROM board WHERE id = #{id}
